content: **difficulty** this is an easy level pattern single and double_crochet stitches are used to make this purse **finished measurements** purse is 14 cm 5 5 wide purse strap length is customizable sample has a strap length of 90 cm 35 5 **yarn** you will need the following amounts of a worsted weight 4 yarn *color a* meters 15 yards 16 5 *color b* meters 40 yards 44 sample was made using lily sugar n cream yarn lily sugar n cream is a 100% cotton worsted weight 4 yarn that contains 184 meters 200 yards per 113 grams 4 oz **suggested hook size & notions** * 5 mm crochet hook * 4 5 mm crochet hook * tapestry needle * 2 stitch markers * scissors **techniques used** single and double_crochet stitches are used to make this purse a technique known as an invisible join is also used there are both picture and video tutorials for this technique this pattern comes with a full video tutorial on youtube
